attributes.action: A Royal Commission should be set up to look into the whole process of Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
Financials
HoC and parliamentary procedures
Ministers (Inc PMs) roles
The rules of the referendum and future ones

attributes.background: The hole referendum, Government plans, PMs role and parliamentary systems, rules and regulations have been controversial and the public need to know what is right and wrong
